name: Reflections of Life: Tree of Dreams (Full) - Game
name_original: Reflections of Life: Tree of Dreams (Full) - Game
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

For your whole life, you’ve thought that you were an orphan, and that your parents were long gone. But one fateful night, a stranger emerges from your mirror claiming not only to be your uncle, but that your parents are actually still alive, only in a different world! Their home is under attack from an evil force, and you may be only one who stands any chance of stopping it!

• TAKE A TRIP TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE MIRROR
Some dark creature pulled your uncle back through the portal. To find out if what he said was true, you’ll have to follow deep into unknown territory!

• CAN YOUR AMULET UNLOCK YOUR DREAMS?
This family heirloom will come in handy in a world of fantastic hidden object scenes.

• YOUR WISE LITTLE FRIEND WILL HELP YOU ALONG THE WAY
Use your owl’s special abilities to solve bizarre puzzles and magical mini-games.

• CONTINUE YOUR ADVENTURE IN THE EXCITING BONUS CHAPTER
Unravel another part of the story and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Leaves, morphing objects, and more!
